DEMO_102_MSG_010: ̅Ah, ȁ... It would appear that I am once more in need of your assistance.
DEMO_102_MSG_020:
́This security gate will not budge. As you've certainly noticed, the city's electricity has been shut off.
ā
DEMO_102_MSG_030: ́Even though there may still be some humans inside, we can't enter the building by any normal means.
DEMO_102_MSG_040: ́But there are monsters on the way to the Transmission Facility where the power supply unit is. So we can't go there ourselves.
DEMO_102_MSG_050: ́Please, you must head towards the Power Plant and restore power to this city.
DEMO_102_MSG_060: ́Simply proceed clockwise from here along the road, and you should eventually arrive at the Power Plant.
DEMO_102_MSG_070:
́Additionally, seek out another Monolith nearby in the 
northwest on your way there.
ā
DEMO_102_MSG_080:
́It likely holds the secret to teaching you a new 
and useful ability, exclusive to Monster Masters!
DEMO_102_MSG_090: ̅We're all counting on you to restore the power... we'll accomplish nothing here unless we can enter this building.
